div.p: This code system https://standards.digital.health.nz/ns/practitioner-registration-status-code defines the following codes:

tr.td: A provider who holds or is deemed to hold a current practising certificate.
A provider who is not practising
A provider who has been removed from the register – this includes voluntary removal, de-registration and deceased
A provider who is suspended from practising by a Responsible Authority

description.value: The code list represents the current practicing status of the Provider Person as per their registration with an RA.
